skins.shipDescription: Shikishima-class battleship number four C Mikasa.
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Mikasa, a Shikishima-type battleship, and last of the Six-Six Fleet shipbuilding program. I served as the flagship of the Combined Fleet, and won a glorious victory that honored the name of our country across the world.
skins.acquisition: I am the one who braved a hail of bullets and shells to return to my homeland with glory and victory. I am Mikasa, pre-dreadnought battleship of the Sakura Empire and flagship of the 1st Fleet, awaiting your command!
skins.login: Until we've reclaimed our former glory, we must never stop pressing forward!
skins.details: A flagship must lead from the vanguard. This is a self-evident truth.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The victory at Tsushima did not occur by chance.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Royal cuisine? I'll pass... I've had enough of that.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Those things flying through the sky... Err, they're called "ear-playings," right?
skins.secretaryTouch: Even the most hardworking people sometimes have lapses of judgment. It is my duty to admonish you in times like these.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You'd like me to be your dance partner at the next banquet? ... I-I suppose I have no choice...

skins.shipDescription: I, battleship Mikasa, from now until eternity, pledge to you my undying love and devotion. May we help each other, encourage each other, and walk side-by-side on the same path. I hope to meet your expectations, as unworthy as I may be.
skins.acquisition: I, battleship Mikasa, from now until eternity, pledge to you my undying love and devotion. May we help each other, encourage each other, and walk side-by-side on the same path. I hope to meet your expectations, as unworthy as I may be.
skins.login: I can't get used to calling you "Dear" or you calling me "Honey"... Calling each other by what we already do would be easier? Very well, as long as you're fine with it...
skins.details: Well, perfect timing. Hm... It looks like this size should fit you... As the one in charge, you can't neglect stocking up on necessities. Once we're in the middle of battle, even your best clothes can get all torn up in the blink of an eye. Make sure you to get some spares while we're still in the lull of peace.
skins.secretaryIdle1: My Commander, don't slack on your studies. If you'd like, I'd be happy to teach you personally.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Tonight's menu... How about I make you naval curry that originates from a port I have an affinity with? Of course, it's simply exquisite.
skins.secretaryIdle3: So those are "airplanes." The true potential of new things are often overlooked for quite some time. Do your best to not do the same.
skins.secretaryTouch: Urgh, how in the world do you use this cellular phone thing? ...Grrrr...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: You're working very hard, so I guess I'll allow this much...

skins.shipDescription: I found quite the nostalgic outfit when I was cleaning my wardrobe. Let's see... "Prepare to come with me on a new journey!" How do I look, Commander?
skins.acquisition: I found quite the nostalgic outfit when I was cleaning my wardrobe. Let's see... "Prepare to come with me on a new journey!" How do I look, Commander?
skins.login: Mhm, a fine morning. Have you had breakfast yet?
skins.details: Mm... what a pleasant breeze. A fine day to embark on a new journey.
skins.secretaryIdle1: When I don this uniform, I feel like I'm being called to my more youthful days... Ah, that's right! It's that excitement of going on a trip for the first time as a kid! Hehe~
skins.secretaryIdle2: Back then, many of us went abroad to study with the Royal Navy. Hm, you can't picture me doing that? Want to see for yourself? Well, we're just a few minutes from the Royal dorms though. Hahaha!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Looking back, I sometimes miss those days... but right now, this fleet is where I belong.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey! Knock that off! You're going to make me drop my luggage...

skins.shipDescription: It's about time for the flowers to bloom once more. Alas, how the time flies by... Ahem, Commander, let's see, would you like to go blossom-viewing with me?
skins.acquisition: It's about time for the flowers to bloom once more. Alas, how the time flies by... Ahem, Commander, let's see, would you like to go blossom-viewing with me?
skins.login: Mhm, clear skies and a gentle breeze. Fine weather indeed for admiring the flowers.
skins.details: The cherry blossoms in full bloom are a beautiful sight to behold, no matter the era.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, I... Um, does this outfit look good on me? Come on, no need to be shy. Ahaha!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: F-fine... I shall permit it, just a little.
